document_data.name: Delosar's Pearls
document_data.mainbody: '''Delosar's Pearls''' was a tavern in the [[Amn]]ian city of [[Esmeltaran]] during the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: The tavern was built on the eastern side of Esmeltaran, near the shore of [[Lake Esmel]].
document_data.Services: Delosar's Pearls provided decent service at a reasonable price.
